item.title: 📰 [AWS] AWS Weekly Roundup: AWS Transform, Amazon Neptune, and more (September 8, 2025)
item.description:
概要

Summer has drawn to a close here in Utrecht, where I live in the Netherlands. In two weeks, I’ll be attending AWS Community Day 2025, hosted at the Kinepolis Jaarbeurs Utrecht on September 24. The single-day event will bring together over 500 cloud practitioners from across the Netherlands, featurin…

📊 出典: AWS
📅 収集日: 2025年09月10日

item.title: 📰 [Kubernetes] Kubernetes v1.34: VolumeAttributesClass for Volume Modification GA
item.description:
概要

The VolumeAttributesClass API, which empowers users to dynamically modify volume attributes, has officially graduated to General Availability (GA) in Kubernetes v1.34. This marks a significant milestone, providing a robust and stable way to tune your persistent storage directly within Kubernetes....

item.description:
概要

item.title: 📰 [Kubernetes] Kubernetes v1.34: PSI Metrics for Kubernetes Graduates to Beta
item.description:
概要

As Kubernetes clusters grow in size and complexity, understanding the health and performance of individual nodes becomes increasingly critical. We are excited to announce that as of Kubernetes v1.34, Pressure Stall Information (PSI) Metrics has graduated to Beta.
